alert.note: Alert for Clarendon; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 6:42PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Clarendon and southwestern Sumter Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 642 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South Sumter, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sumter, Manning, South Sumter, Mulberry, Alcolu, Millwood, Sumter County Airport, Paxville, Cane Savannah, Brogdon, Lakewood, Privateer, Wedgewood, East Sumter, Cherryvale, Gable and Dalzell. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 112 and 133. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
